features: 9L Large Capacity: With a generous 9-liter capacity, this portable washing machine can accommodate a significant amount of laundry, allowing you to wash multiple baby clothes/underwear/panties/socks/towels at once.

3-in-1 Functionality Washer: This versatile mini washing machine offers three modes: standard wash, gentle wash for delicate fabrics, and spin mode( With a detachable spin basket) for efficient water drainage(with detachable drainage pipe). It provides a comprehensive solution for all your laundry needs.
Powerful Copper Motor: Equipped with a robust 40W copper motor, this portable washing machine and dryer delivers strong cleaning power, ensuring thorough cleansing of your clothes.

Advanced Hygiene Technology: Our portable washer machine and dryer incorporates advanced hygiene technology to ensure a clean and fresh laundry experience. It utilizes innovative UV light technology to effectively maintain cleanliness and freshness in your clothes.
Foldable & Space-Saving: The folding feature of this foldable mini washing machine allows for easy storage, making it ideal for small apartments, dormitories, or RVs where space is limited.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Waterproof Control Panel Our mini washing machine, with its waterproof control panel, provides three convenient time modes: a 5-minute standard wash, a 10-minute gentle wash, and a 2-minute spin cycle (complete with a detachable spin basket and drainage pipe). Customize your wash to tackle dirt and stains effectively. Efficient Cleaning with Power Our mini washer and dryer powered by a high-performance motor ensures your clothes are thoroughly cleaned. It's not just portable; it uses only 1/20th of the water consumed by a regular washing machine, conserving water and energy. Blue Light Sterilization Utilizing blue light sterilization, our portable washing machine is perfect for sanitizing underwear or baby clothes, guaranteeing the health and safety of your entire family.

Removable Drainage Pipe Featuring a removable drainage pipe design, our portable washer machine and dryer allow effortless drainage after rinsing, ensuring hassle-free water disposal. Portable Handle Our mini foldable washing machine is equipped with a convenient portable handle, making it easy to use on your travels or any occasion. Portable Cleaning, Anywhere, Anytime Compact & portable washing machine designed for both home and travel. Experience the freedom of thorough cleaning, wherever life takes you. Lightweight and space-saving, it ensures pristine clothes effortlessly, making laundry a breeze at home or on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Like a couple other reviews said, it beeps when first plugged in and then nothing. The instructions aren’t even the bare minimum. No amount of pressing and holding got it to turn on. I pulled the front of the button screen off and there isn’t even a button underneath the “start” button and only three holes under the different modes, presumably for lights but I don’t know since it doesn’t start. It’s basically just a bucket for me to hand wash small items in now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little wash machine for small items
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this portable wash machine to just wash small items like tea towels, dishcloths, socks, and underwear. It washes the items well. As for the spinner, it only spins for 2 mins and if you want it to spin longer you have to keep turning it back on the seetin which is called drain. The spinner bowl snaps in securely. It doesn't spin all the items at once very well. I just did one or two items at a time. If they are heavy items like wool socks or tea towels you might have to still wring them out by hand. That isn't a big deal for me. For the price, I feel it's worth it.

reviews.reviewerName: Did not work, like another review mentioned it just won’t turn on no matter for how long or how hard you press the start button for. It did beep when I plugged it but that’s all it did. Will be returning it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Did not turn on at all
reviews.reviewText: Like another review said, it arrived and did not work at all, no matter for how long or how hard I pressed start. It did beep when I plugged it but that’s all it did. Will be returning it. Would’ve been a cute machine if it did work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DOA. Read the instructions, plugged it in, got beep, but motor would not turn on
reviews.reviewText: The box tells you to read the instruction manual (a tiny slip of paper) which I did. I followed the instructions. I plugged it in and it beeped; however, no amount of pressing the buttons would turn the motor on. I pressed all around the area for 2+ seconds (up to 5 seconds), and nothing happened.I’m returning this one and getting another one to see if I just got a bad one. Once I get the second one, I’ll update this to say that it either worked or was also dead on arrival.

reviews.reviewerName: Talks too much and displays delusions of adequacy
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for camping or in a pinch!
reviews.reviewText: We love to camp and I thought this would be perfect to do small loads for a family of four and it worked flawlessly, I was impressed. We’ve also had multiple issues with our plumbing as our house is older and so we’ve gone through a few brief periods where we couldn’t use our washing machine until plumbers had a chance to work on our old drains, and I thought this would have been so helpful to have during those times. Of course it hasn’t happened since, so I’m hoping just having this is a good luck charm that means we wont have anymore issues lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not turn on!!!
reviews.reviewText: My machine will not turn on. Makes a sound when I plug it in, but the machine will not run at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does work!
reviews.reviewText: I got this just to see if it really worked. I washed a few items and added minimum liquid laundry detergent. It washed just fine, rinsing out the soap I did twice, just to make sure it was all out. The spin cycle moves the whole machine, even with the suction cups pushed down. I was thinking this may be an alternative to hand washing. It could be. But for use inside the house, I found that the drain pipe really needs to be longer, also should be a bit closer to the bottom, to drain all the liquid you must tilt the machine towards the drain.If I was camping and had access to running water, and electricity this would be nice to have around. A good way to wash small items like socks if you get your feet all wet.I think they feel that the "blue ray light" ultraviolet light that sterilizes bacteria will make the clothes clean. It might, but I still want to use a little soap. So you have to have it close to a drain, running water, and electricity. I would not use it for anything too heavy, unless you have a line that you can drip dry it on. It could wash it, but not really spin dry it at all. The basket is too small to do anything other than t-shirts, underwear, socks, and such.At this price point, if you camp in places that have water and electricity, it could be very handy, however it is a bit high for the amount of how it is presently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gave 1 star bc I ordered my first unit it only beeped. Nothing else. Amazon. Replaced n same problem. So maybe a bad batch. But I wasn’t going for a 3 rd bad one.I’ve been watching YouTube like mad. These get great reviews as long as you understand this is a step above a sink. ( washing by hand) Watch YouTube on these!!I can’t honestly say anything about this item.The larger you go obviously the more n larger items that can be washed.
